content: this set is really close to my heart i designed it for my daughter who is due in december 2018 and i named it after my daugther when i completed it i decided to share it with other people too the pattern is suitable for advanced beginners or intermediate crocheters using different types of stitches creating a nice textured look note the size is for only 0-3 months babies but i am planning to make more size options in the future you can use any dk or baby dk yarn for this project it s completely up to you i hope you ll enjoy making it happy crocheting wink
